item.title: Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.12. Key Summary Category CELLSJAVA-42745 Change returned value for getting Connection points New Feature CELLSJAVA-42662 Provide ability to export range as HTML New Feature CELLSJAVA-42746 Data bars are missing when XLSX is converted to HTML New Feature CELLSJAVA-42747 Value still exists when XLSX is converted to HTML New Feature CELLSJAVA-42634 Convert left right ribbon shape to image Enhancement CELLSJAVA-42713 Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.9. Key Summary Category CELLSJAVA-42680 Disable Pivot Table Ribbon New Feature CELLSJAVA-42568 Protect workbook and worksheet in ODS file New Feature CELLSJAVA-42668 Support multiple values when using class style (Linked to: CELLSJAVA-42635) Enhancement CELLSJAVA-42627 Unable to extract Smart Art images correctly - Shape to image conversion (CELLSJAVA-42619) Enhancement CELLSJAVA-42677 Interruption issue with saving XLSX file process Enhancement CELLSJAVA-42687 Hyperlink not working when referenced from other sheet Enhancement CELLSJAVA-42672 The output PDF document is too big Bug CELLSJAVA-42671 Hyperlinks issue when viewing the output Excel file in MS Excel Japanese version Bug CELLSJAVA-42667 Getting ‘#NUM!

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.6. Key Summary Category CELLSJAVA-42523 Use FIPS compliant version of Bouncy Castle in Aspose.Cells APIs New Feature CELLSJAVA-42550 The concurrent conversion to PDF while each workbook has his own private (exclusive) set of fonts New Feature CELLSJAVA-42339 Implement custom data sorting in Pivot Table report via Aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.3 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Android via Java 18.3. Key Summary Category CELLSJAVA-42493 Provide an option to decide whether exporting workbook properties New Feature CELLSJAVA-42491 Provide an option to decide whether exporting document properties New Feature CELLSJAVA-42498 Create a PdfBookmarkEntry for a chart sheet New Feature CELLSJAVA-42509 Add LoadDataFilterOptions.NAMES constant to filter defined names when loading workbook New Feature CELLSJAVA-42519 PdfSaveOptions.
